title: What are the specifications of Realme 5? - Quora

response.answer_text: The main highlight of this smartphone is it's quad camera. It has a 12 MP AI quad camera with Ultra wide angle & Macro lens. It has a massive 5000 mAh battery and the brand says it can hold upto 29.9 days of battery life. The processor used here is SD 665 AIE which is based on Octa-core 11 nm chipset. It has 6.5″ minidrop fullscreen display and 89% of Screen to Body ratio. It is being available in New Crystal Design with Nano Holographic Color which looks pretty good. It has a Space-Inspired Real Design OS i.e. ColorOS 6. Overall, it is a good smartphone in its range.

Performance Octa core (2 GHz, Quad Core + 1.8 GHz, Quad core)Snapdragon 6653 GB RAMDisplay 6.5 inches (16.51 cm)720x1600 px, 270 PPIIPS LCDCamera 12 + 8 + 2 + 2 MP Quad Primary CamerasLED Flash13 MP Front CameraBattery 5000 mAhNon-Removable
